select DISTINCT coalesce (result.zokusei${zokuseiSortCd},'') as "${colName}",coalesce ( nm, '' ) as "${colName}", round(sum(relation.area*tana_width)/${width},2) as area,coalesce ( mst.zokusei_nm, '' ) as "classifyName" from planocycle.work_basic_pattern_restrict_result result inner join planocycle.work_basic_pattern_restrict_relation relation on relation.restrict_cd = result.restrict_cd and result.priority_order_cd = relation.priority_order_cd left join masterdb.planocycle_zokusei_mst_data mstdata on coalesce (zokusei${zokuseiSortCd},'') = coalesce ( val, '' ) and concat(mstdata.company_cd, '_', mstdata.class_cd) in (concat(#{companyCd}, '_', #{classCd}), '9999_0000') inner join masterdb.planocycle_zokusei_mst mst on concat(mst.company_cd, '_', mst.class_cd) in (concat(#{companyCd}, '_', #{classCd}), '9999_0000') and mst.zokusei_id = #{attr} ::integer left join planocycle.work_priority_order_pts_data_tanamst tanamst on tanamst.pts_cd =#{id} and tanamst.tai_cd = relation.tai_cd and tanamst.tana_cd = relation.tana_cd where result.priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by coalesce (result.zokusei${zokuseiSortCd},''),coalesce ( nm, '' ),coalesce ( mst.zokusei_nm, '' )

select value,zokusei_nm,zokusei_col from planocycle.work_priority_order_mst_attrsort attrsort left join masterdb.planocycle_zokusei_mst zokuseimst on zokuseimst.zokusei_id = attrsort.value and concat(zokuseimst.company_cd, '_', zokuseimst.class_cd) in (concat(#{company}, '_', #{classCd}), '9999_0000') where attrsort.company_cd = #{companyCd} and priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd} order by sort
